name: MemoizingBiFunction

methods.name: compose

parameters.name: before
parameters.type: java.util.function.@lombok.NonNull Function<? super K1,java.util.Map.Entry<? extends T,? extends U>>

methods.name: forEach
methods.documentation: Applies the given consumer to all currently cached values.

methods.name: isCached
methods.documentation: Returns {@code true} if the function has already cached a value for the given inputs.

methods.name: remove
methods.documentation:
Removes the cached result for the given input pair, if present.

 @return the previously cached result or {@code null}
